High Priest Orven:
I think there are still too many monsters.
Go to the Plains of Gloryre and defeat the monsters that roam the Plains of Glory. Monsters to hunt: Vanor Silenos, Vanor Silenos Soldier, Vanor Silenos Scout, Vanor Silenos Warrior, Vanor Silenos Shaman, Vanor Silenos Chieftain, Vanor Mercenary of Glory, Guard of Honor.
